actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a certain river in the State of Arkansas for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, a section of the Mulberry River in the State of Arkansas for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a certain river in the State of Arkansas for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
